info.title: KeyVaultClient
info.description: The key vault client performs cryptographic key operations and vault operations against the Key Vault service.

post.description: Creates full backup using user provided SAS token to Azure Blob Storage container

parameters.name: azureStorageBlobContainerUri
parameters.description: Azure Blob shared access signature token pointing to a valid Azure Blob container where the full backup needs to be stored. This token needs to be valid for atleast next 24 hours from the time of making this call

default.description: Key Vault error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Returns the full backup operation status

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: Job Id returned part of the creation of backup

200.description: OK - Returns the full backup status

default.description: Key Vault error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Restores all key materials using the SAS token to the previously stored Azure Storage backup folder

parameters.name: restoreBlobDetails
parameters.description: Azure blob SAS token to the folder where the previous successful full backup was stored

default.description: Key Vault error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Returns the full restore operation status from a user provided valid backup

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: Job Id returned part of the full restore operation

200.description: OK - Returns the full restore status

default.description: Key Vault error response describing why the operation failed.

folderToRestore.description: Folder name of the blob where the previous successful full backup is stored

token.description: Azure Blob storage SAS token pointing to the azure blob storage container

statusDetails.description: The status details of backup operation.

error.description: Error encountered, if any, during the full backup operation.

startTime.description: The start time of the backup operation in UTC

endTime.description: The end time of the backup operation in UTC

jobId.description: Identifier for the full backup operation.

azureStorageBlobContainerUri.description: The Azure Blob storage folder Uri which contains the full backup

statusDetails.description: The status details of restore operation.

error.description: Error encountered, if any, during the full restore operation.

jobId.description: Identifier for the full restore operation.

startTime.description: The start time of the restore operation

endTime.description: The end time of the restore operation
